original_title: Jeff Mangum Live at Jittery Joe's
overview: Live at Jittery Joe's is a video album released in 2001 by Jeff Mangum of Neutral Milk Hotel to battle the high prices of bootlegs on eBay. Filmmaker Lance Bangs recorded it on  high 8 video at the Athens, GA venue Jittery Joe's on March 7, 1997 during a live solo performance.
title: Jeff Mangum Live at Jittery Joe's
